articles.title: Asian Stocks Set to Fall as Global Rally Stalls: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: US equity-index futures inched higher in Asian trading after signs of fatigue in the AI-driven rally caused two days of declines on Wall Street.

articles.title: Xcel settles Marshall Fire lawsuit just before trial begins in Boulder - Colorado Public Radio
articles.description: Xcel Energy and two telecom companies have reached a settlement agreement in the Marshall Fire trial.

articles.title: Disney Hit With Legal Salvo From Shareholders Over Jimmy Kimmel Suspension - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The entertainment giant may soon have to turn over documents and communications dealing with the late-night host's sidelining, including company moderation polices and copies of deals with affiliate stations addressing their right to pre-empt programming.

articles.title: HSBC Says New Quantum Computing Trial Beat Wall Street Rivals - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: HSBC Holdings Plc said it’s achieved a world-first breakthrough in deploying quantum computing in financial markets, as a race intensifies among some of Wall Street’s biggest firms to embed the cutting-edge technology in their daily operations.

articles.title: FDA warns of possible radioactive shrimp risk again in new 31-state recall - Axios
articles.description: The FDA said the shrimp cocktails may be contaminated with Cesium-13, a radioactive isotope.

articles.title: Oil and gas executives sour on their cheerleader-in-chief - Politico
Canada bank employee charged with accessing PM Mark Carney's account - BBC
articles.description: A 23-year-old is accused of fraud, unauthorised use of a computer, identity theft and trafficking identity information, police say.

articles.title: Bank of America resets Nvidia stock forecast after OpenAI deal - TheStreet
articles.description: Here's what could happen to Nvidia shares next.

articles.title: Citigroup to sell stake in Mexico’s Banamex for $2.3bn - Financial Times
articles.description: Financier Fernando Chico Pardo to buy 25% position in lender as Wall Street giant seeks to exit the retail bank

articles.title: US Sets Stage for Tariffs on Robotics, Medical Devices - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The Trump administration launched investigations into imports of robotics, industrial machinery and medical devices, setting the stage for fresh duties as President Donald Trump moves to expand his tariff regime.

articles.title: Oracle Stock Pulls Back. Tech Giant Reportedly Weighs Bond Sale As New Stargate Plans Unveiled. - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Oracle stock was lower following news it will look to raise $15 billon through a bond sale. OpenAI also revealed new Stargate locations.

articles.title: What to know about leucovorin, unproven autism drug touted by Trump - PBS
articles.description: When President Donald Trump’s administration announced it would repurpose an old, generic drug as a new treatment for autism, it came as a surprise to many experts — including the physician who suggested the idea to the nation’s top health officials.

articles.title: Dow Jones Today: Stock Indexes End Lower for 2nd Straight Session; Shares of Tech Giants Fall Again; Energy Sector Outperforms as Oil Prices Rise - Investopedia
articles.description: Major stock indexes ended lower for a second straight day Wednesday following a three-session streak of record closing highs. Technology stocks declined, although energy shares rose along with the price of crude.

articles.title: Trump administration wants 10% stake in American lithium miner that sells to GM - TechCrunch
articles.description: Lithium Americas asked for a small change to the loan repayment period, which spurred the latest Trump administration request for equity.

articles.title: Newsom suggests he will sign major California AI bill - Politico
articles.description: The governor hinted he would sign a piece of major AI legislation, but did not explicitly say which bill.

articles.title: China Buys More Argentine Soybeans as Tax Relief Spurs Trade - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: China bought at least 10 more cargoes of Argentine soybeans, taking advantage of a temporary break in the South American country’s export levies to stock up amid a trade war with the US, its second-largest supplier.

articles.title: Early warning signs for the DC region’s economy amid federal downsizing - Brookings
articles.description: Federal transformation is creating real turmoil in the DMV regional economy. In the coming months, we will continue to monitor both the challenges and opportunities of this transformation.

articles.title: Top Federal Reserve official warns against series of rate cuts - Financial Times
articles.description: Austan Goolsbee says weakening in jobs market does not signal looming recession

articles.title: ALDI Just Announced A Major Change Is Coming To Stores—And It's Exactly What Fans Asked For - Southern Living
articles.description: ALDI fans, your voices have been heard! For the first time ever, ALDI is rebranding its private label products, giving shoppers another reason to reach for its products.
